content: I won't be able to do triage tomorrow, have too much backlog to sort through unfortunately. @rylev let me know what your availability is like - I may be able to eke out 30-60 minutes before Thursday if necessary
I won't be able to today, but I should have time tomorrow morning (Europe time)
Hm, @rylev did this perhaps slip? I don't think I saw anything about it today...

One thing I keep noticing when trying to look more closely into where a given regression came from is that the detailed view on perf.rlo (pages like this one) is too noisy to compare different runs. It's great for getting an overview where the compiler roughly spends its time for a given test case -- but when comparing two different runs it's almost useless. I hope we can have instruction counts there too at some point (or have more test iterations in order to reduce noise)
Is it odd that that page @mw linked does not let one sort by “Time delta” (%)
